title: Independent Life: A Purr, Kitten Bonus Chapter
description: “A child needs a home.” It is a fateful night. The Red Moon Pack is under attack. The eleven-year- old Kathryn is woken up from her deep slumber, and she has got to run… alone. His father and brothers are left to fight against the enemies. Not looking back, Kathryn is now on her way to nowhere. Holding on to the promise that her brothers will find her once the battle is done, she has to find a way to survive by herself. But can a young girl survive the world alone? Will she ever find herself a place to call home?
author: Kristel Juurik
